nodes.text: Nal Kenuun's apartment was the home of the Muun gambler Nal Kenuun located on one of the tallest buildings in the city of Pilaan on the planet Muunilinst. The apartment was nearly empty inside, containing only a few pieces of sleek black furniture, appearing nearly invisible against the black walls. Transparisteel windows covered both floor and ceiling, giving a wide view of the Pilaan skyline. Smuggler Han Solo concluded that the home projected a quiet, careful wealth when he, along with the Rebels Luke Skywalker, Leia Organa and X-7, went there in 0 ABY.
